ThingDef.label: casino honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by casino bees. Casino bees are avid gamblers, always ready to roll the dice. Honeycombs can be processed in a Honey Extractor to get honey, beeswax and benign archotech fate manipulators.

ThingDef.label: ominous honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by ominous bees. An entire breed of bees characterized by their obscene bad luck, ominous bees always see the worst in any situation. They will extract shards of nearby manipulators and produce honeycombs that extract into Dark archotech fate manipulators. Honeycombs can be processed in a Honey Extractor to get black honey, beeswax and Dark archotech fate manipulators.

ThingDef.label: fortunate honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by fortunate bees. An entire breed of bees characterized by their incredible good luck, fortunate bees are irredeemable optimists. They will extract shards of nearby manipulators and produce honeycombs that extract into Chaotic archotech fate manipulators. Honeycombs can be processed in a Honey Extractor to get white honey, beeswax and Chaotic archotech fate manipulators.
